Container.Description: MakeMKV is a tool for ripping Blu-ray and DVDs. This container is based on Hurricanes dockergui container with both rdp support and webgui.[br] Fill in the rdp and webgui ports you want in the Port section. Remember to NOT change the containerport![br] You can change the resolution in the Environment section to whatever you want.[br] Remember to change to the /unRaid folder in the settings of MakeMKV as the default location of saving MKVs. If you forget this you will fill up your docker.img![br] By default I have added mapping of the first DVD/BD-ROM. If this is not correct you should change it in the Extra Paramters section.[br] If you have more than one device and want to rip from both you will need to use two containers.
